Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Boston in 2019...
Injured on 4/11/2019 with a Blister On Finger, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2020, off Luis Castro (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/26/2020, off Tyrone Scheetz (BRO)...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 8/2/2020...
Injured on 4/6/2021 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Chicago on 6/5/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2021, hitting .536 with 1 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2021...
Injured on 6/23/2022 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,907,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/26/2023 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 7/28/2023...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2023...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,907,143 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Boston to Detroit on 3/2/2024 (Going to DET: SS John Hawkins. Going to BOS: P Nicholas Chidester, CF Bruce Beard)...
Injured on 5/1/2024 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
